verses.verse: And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> sent <WH7971> out of <WH4480> Shittim <WH7851> two <WH8147> men <WH376> to spy <WH7270> secretly, <WH2791> saying, <WH559> Go <WH1980> view <WH7200> <WH853> the land, <WH776> even Jericho. <WH3405> And they went, <WH1980> and came into <WH935> a harlot's <WH802> <WH2181> house, <WH1004> named <WH8034> Rahab, <WH7343> and lodged <WH7901> there. <WH8033>

And it was told <WH559> the king <WH4428> of Jericho, <WH3405> saying, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> there came <WH935> men <WH376> in hither <WH2008> tonight <WH3915> of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to search out <WH2658> <WH853> the country. <WH776>

And the king <WH4428> of Jericho <WH3405> sent <WH7971> unto <WH413> Rahab, <WH7343> saying, <WH559> Bring forth <WH3318> the men <WH376> that are come <WH935> to <WH413> thee, which <WH834> are entered <WH935> into thine house: <WH1004> for <WH3588> they be come <WH935> to search out <WH2658> <WH853> all <WH3605> the country. <WH776>

And the woman <WH802> took <WH3947> <WH853> the two <WH8147> men, <WH376> and hid <WH6845> them, and said <WH559> thus, <WH3651> There came <WH935> men <WH376> unto <WH413> me, but I knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> whence <WH4480> <WH370> they <WH1992> were:

And it came to pass <WH1961> about the time of shutting <WH5462> of the gate, <WH8179> when it was dark, <WH2822> that the men <WH376> went out: <WH3318> whither <WH575> the men <WH376> went <WH1980> I know <WH3045> not: <WH3808> pursue <WH7291> after <WH310> them quickly; <WH4118> for <WH3588> ye shall overtake <WH5381> them.

But she <WH1931> had brought them up <WH5927> to the roof <WH1406> of the house, and hid <WH2934> them with the stalks <WH6086> of flax, <WH6593> which she had laid in order <WH6186> upon <WH5921> the roof. <WH1406>

And the men <WH376> pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> them the way <WH1870> to Jordan <WH3383> unto <WH5921> the fords: <WH4569> and as soon as <WH310> <WH834> they which pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> them were gone out, <WH3318> they shut <WH5462> the gate. <WH8179>
And before <WH2962> they <WH1992> were laid down, <WH7901> she <WH1931> came up <WH5927> unto <WH5921> them upon <WH5921> the roof; <WH1406>

And she said <WH559> unto <WH413> the men, <WH376> I know <WH3045> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> you <WH853> the land, <WH776> and that <WH3588> your terror <WH367> is fallen <WH5307> upon <WH5921> us, and that <WH3588> all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> faint <WH4127> because of <WH4480> <WH6440> you.

For <WH3588> we have heard <WH8085> <WH853> how <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> dried up <WH3001> <WH853> the water <WH4325> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> for <WH4480> <WH6440> you, when ye came out <WH3318> of Egypt; <WH4480> <WH4714> and what <WH834> ye did <WH6213> unto the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> that <WH834> were on the other side <WH5676> Jordan, <WH3383> Sihon <WH5511> and Og, <WH5747> whom <WH834> ye utterly destroyed. <WH2763> <WH853>

And as soon as we had heard <WH8085> these things, our hearts <WH3824> did melt, <WH4549> neither <WH3808> did there remain <WH6965> any more <WH5750> courage <WH7307> in any man <WH376> because of <WH4480> <WH6440> you: for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> he <WH1931> is God <WH430> in heaven <WH8064> above, <WH4480> <WH4605> and in <WH5921> earth <WH776> beneath. <WH4480> <WH8478>

Now <WH6258> therefore, I pray <WH4994> you, swear <WH7650> unto me by the LORD, <WH3068> since <WH3588> I have showed you kindness, <WH6213> <WH5973> <WH2617> that ye <WH859> will also <WH1571> show <WH6213> kindness <WH2617> unto <WH5973> my father's <WH1> house, <WH1004> and give <WH5414> me a true <WH571> token: <WH226>

And that ye will save alive <WH2421> <WH853> my father, <WH1> and my mother, <WH517> and my brethren, <WH251> and my sisters, <WH269> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> they have, and deliver <WH5337> <WH853> our lives <WH5315> from death. <WH4480> <WH4194>

And the men <WH376> answered <WH559> her, Our life <WH5315> for <WH8478> yours, if <WH518> ye utter <WH5046> not <WH3808> <WH853> this <WH2088> our business. <WH1697> And it shall be, <WH1961> when the LORD <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> us <WH853> the land, <WH776> that we will deal <WH6213> kindly <WH2617> and truly <WH571> with <WH5973> thee.

Then she let them down <WH3381> by a cord <WH2256> through <WH1157> the window: <WH2474> for <WH3588> her house <WH1004> was upon the town <WH2346> wall, <WH7023> and she <WH1931> dwelt <WH3427> upon the wall. <WH2346>

And she said <WH559> unto them, Get <WH1980> you to the mountain, <WH2022> lest <WH6435> the pursuers <WH7291> meet <WH6293> you; and hide yourselves <WH2247> there <WH8033> three <WH7969> days, <WH3117> until <WH5704> the pursuers <WH7291> be returned: <WH7725> and afterward <WH310> may ye go <WH1980> your way. <WH1870>
And the men <WH376> said <WH559> unto <WH413> her, We <WH587> will be blameless <WH5355> of this thine oath <WH4480> <WH7621> <WH2088> which <WH834> thou hast made us swear. <WH7650>

Behold, <WH2009> when we <WH587> come <WH935> into the land, <WH776> thou shalt bind <WH7194> <WH853> this <WH2088> line <WH8615> of scarlet <WH8144> thread <WH2339> in the window <WH2474> which <WH834> thou didst let us down <WH3381> by: and thou shalt bring <WH622> thy father, <WH1> and thy mother, <WH517> and thy brethren, <WH251> and all <WH3605> thy father's <WH1> household, <WH1004> home <WH1004> unto <WH413> thee.

And it shall be, <WH1961> that whosoever <WH3605> <WH834> shall go out <WH3318> of the doors <WH4480> <WH1817> of thy house <WH1004> into the street, <WH2351> his blood <WH1818> shall be upon his head, <WH7218> and we <WH587> will be guiltless: <WH5355> and whosoever <WH3605> <WH834> shall be <WH1961> with <WH854> thee in the house, <WH1004> his blood <WH1818> shall be on our head, <WH7218> if <WH518> any hand <WH3027> be <WH1961> upon him.

And if <WH518> thou utter <WH5046> <WH853> this <WH2088> our business, <WH1697> then we will be <WH1961> quit <WH5355> of thine oath <WH4480> <WH7621> which <WH834> thou hast made us to swear. <WH7650>

And she said, <WH559> According unto your words, <WH1697> so <WH3651> be it. <WH1931> And she sent them away, <WH7971> and they departed: <WH1980> and she bound <WH7194> <WH853> the scarlet <WH8144> line <WH8615> in the window. <WH2474>

And they went, <WH1980> and came <WH935> unto the mountain, <WH2022> and abode <WH3427> there <WH8033> three <WH7969> days, <WH3117> until <WH5704> the pursuers <WH7291> were returned: <WH7725> and the pursuers <WH7291> sought <WH1245> them throughout all <WH3605> the way, <WH1870> but found <WH4672> them not. <WH3808>

So the two <WH8147> men <WH376> returned, <WH7725> and descended <WH3381> from the mountain, <WH4480> <WH2022> and passed over, <WH5674> and came <WH935> to <WH413> Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> and told <WH5608> him <WH853> all <WH3605> things that befell <WH4672> them:

And they said <WH559> unto <WH413> Joshua, <WH3091> Truly <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> into our hands <WH3027> <WH853> all <WH3605> the land; <WH776> for even <WH1571> all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the country <WH776> do faint <WH4127> because of <WH4480> <WH6440> us.
